Record numbers: Argentina : 14 , Bolivia : 1 , Brazil : 2 , Chile : 4 , Colombia : 2 , Peru : 1 , Uruguay : 2 ;
total: 26 .

Remarks:
Diphascon ( Adropion )
scoticum sensu
lato is a cosmopolitan complex of very similar species, which can only be determined by careful integrated taxonomy (morphology and molecular techniques). A redescription of
D. ( D. )
scoticum sensu
stricto type material is required before the South American reports of this species can be confirmed.
